comments.raw_text:
In talking with QA we discovered that we were missing python 3 compatibility from the upload scripts.

We also realised that we were missing a way to automatically remove engines that are no longer in the configuration - although QA wanted that just for testing, it seems like in the long-term we might need that anyway.
comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.text:
In talking with QA we discovered that we were missing python 3 compatibility from the upload scripts.

We also realised that we were missing a way to automatically remove engines that are no longer in the configuration - although QA wanted that just for testing, it seems like in the long-term we might need that anyway.

comments.raw_text: PR is now merged, and 1.1.1 released.
